sentences.english: The crew unscrewed the screws from the sewing-machine and chewed them.
sentences.chinese: 海员们从缝纫机上旋下螺钉并咀嚼它们。

sentences.english: In his new home I noticed a sewing-machine and a radio.
sentences.chinese: 在他的新居中，我看到一架缝纫机和一台收音机。

sentences.english: Jinyun Qilong Machinery Co. , Ltd. mainly produces sewing machine and lock ware.
sentences.chinese: 缙云启龙机械有限公司主要生产缝纫机和锁具。

sentences.english: Stitch the beak, folded in half, to the owl with your sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 把喙对折，用缝纫机固定在身体上。

sentences.english: It was a sewing machine she was very comfortable with.
sentences.chinese: 这是一台她用习惯了的缝纫机。

sentences.english: She ran up a skirt on her sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 她用缝纫机快速地缝制了一条裙子。

sentences.english: The causes of wear failure of the shuttle-race were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了缝纫机梭床磨损失效原因。

sentences.english: The sewing machine was clicking away.
Eye Protection: Wear goggles when working with liquids.
sentences.chinese: 使用缝纫机时，建议戴安全防护眼镜。

sentences.english: We can't supply Butterfly Sewing machine from stock, but we can supply panda Sewing Machine instead.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶牌缝纫机我们无存货可供，但熊猫牌可供。

sentences.english: So when she broke the machine, she started making calls to sewing machine repair shops.
sentences.chinese: 所以在她把它弄坏时，她开始打缝纫机修理店的电话。

sentences.english: Special industrial sewing machine , bag closing machine.
sentences.chinese: 特种工业缝纫机，封包封袋设备。

sentences.english: The pedal of the sewing machine needs reparing.
sentences.chinese: 缝纫机的踏板需要修理。

sentences.english: I used to hate sewing before we got a sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 在我们买来缝纫机之前我最恨做针线活。

sentences.english: I hate having to fetch out the sewing machine every time I want to do some sewing.
sentences.chinese: 每当我想做点针线活时就得把缝纫机搬出来，真讨厌。

sentences.english: Encloses safe protection magic eye to avoid the danger of colliding.
sentences.chinese: 使用缝纫机时，建议戴安全防护眼镜。

definition: flying needle and running seam (idiom); skillful needlework
